El d√≠a de hoy solicit√© ped√≠ un deliver, el cual se basaba en un men√∫ del dia( que ya debe estar preparado) y una ensalada de frutas, la se√±orita que me atendi√≥ me dijo que 40 min lo que me pareci√≥ mucho tiempo pero igual acept√©, pas√≥ una hora y mi pedido no llegaba, llam√© a la sucursal y me informan que el domiciliario ten√≠a muchos pedidos y que hab√≠a salido con todo al mismo tiempo, me imagin√© que por ese motivo mi pedido llegar√≠a fr√≠o y as√≠ fue, el pedido lleg√≥ luego de hora y 25 min, la ensalada llevaba el helado el cual lleg√≥ completamente derretido, tra√≠a dos galletas en una p√©sima presentaci√≥n( metidas en una bolsa que ni siquiera cerraba) el men√∫ del d√≠a era supuestamente ‚Äúsopa de mondongo ‚Äú la cual hicieron sobre el caldo de costilla que les sobr√≥ quien sabe de qu√© d√≠a lo cual evidenci√≥ en una foto que estoy adjuntando. Ven√≠a no m√°s de una cucharada de ensalada y no m√°s de una cucharada de pur√© de papa wow incre√≠ble, la comida no estaba tan mal, pero realmente la experiencia fue un desastre y m√°s cuando entr√≥ a las opiniones y veo que cero les importa lo que las personas escriben se justifican en que seg√∫n ellos tienen muchos pedidos por eso es demorado o prestan un mal servicio, si de verdad tienen mucho y si cocina y personal no da abasto deber√≠an contratar m√°s personas o en su defecto cuando uno quiera comprar algo aqu√≠ deben advertirnos que tenemos que estar dispuestos a comer frio, a esperar horas para ser atendidos o a q nos atiendan como ellos quieran

This is my second time visiting this restaurant    the service is very fast and friendly, and the food is absolutely delicious. It‚Äôs my new favorite spot whenever I‚Äôm craving the amazing flavors of my beautiful Colombia.

Fui con un amigo a Lechoner√≠a New York y la verdad todo muy bien. Desde que llegamos nos atendieron con una amabilidad tremenda, se siente el buen ambiente.

Me tom√© una sopa de verduras que me cay√≥ espectacular, bien servida y con sabor casero. Pero lo que no me esperaba fue la lasa√±a de pl√°tano‚Ä¶ una sorpresa total. Nada que ver con la t√≠pica de pasta, es otra cosa, y me gust√≥ bastante.

Los precios me parecieron bien, uno come sabroso sin que se le vaya la vida en la cuenta. Me gust√≥ el sitio, volver√≠a sin problema.
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-
I went with a friend to Lechoner√≠a New York and honestly, everything was great. From the moment we walked in, the staff was super friendly ‚Äî you can really feel the good vibe.

I had a vegetable soup that hit the spot. It was hearty and had that homemade flavor. But what really surprised me was the plantain lasagna‚Ä¶ totally unexpected. Nothing like the typical pasta version ‚Äî it‚Äôs different, and I really liked it.

The prices seemed fair to me, you eat well without breaking the bank. I liked the place, I‚Äôd definitely go back.

Hola a todos! Tengo muchas cosas que decir sobre este lugar (todas son excelentes). Los tamales los com√≠ en casa, y se quedaron cortos con la recomendaci√≥n, han sido los mejores tamales que me he comido aqu√≠ en USA, hab√≠a buscado por mucho tiempo un tamal que realmente me supiera a Bogot√° y aqu√≠ lo encontr√©. By far the best new addition to Maspeth. The specialty here is Lech√≥n, slow roasted pork in their special oven. The food is very reasonably priced, authentic, flavorful. My partner and I had a delicious and filling breakfast with coffee. The guacamole was fresh and delicious - I couldn't help but ask for more. In the lechona, I even got to taste the delicious crispy rice bits - my favorite. Inside is very nice though we chose outdoor seating because we had two dogs (so glad it's dog-friendly) - the umbrellas kept us very dry when it drizzled. The staff was so, so kind and attentive, and explained a lot about the dishes. I will certainly be returning and supporting this wonderful business that very clearly cares about its customers.

I'm not sure how this place has a 4.5 stars , 1st we asked for water , which had floating particles so we asked them to take it back  and give us water bottles, the waitress seemed annoyed because we preferred bottled water .  We ordered a Bandeja Tipica can't go wrong with that so I thought , the plate includes chorizo which was not cooked throughly it was still pink and it tasted more like a hotdog not an authentic Colombian chorizo . The rice was not fresh and partially hard  .The steak was hard We ordered a side of fries which came towards the end of our meal . This food was so bland I couldn't finish my meal . The tostones with guac and chicharron was the best part out of everything we got to eat .

We had great service and excellent food. It was on a Friday night - but we came in around 8:30 so it wasn't crowded.  Our server really went above and beyond to explain the menu options, and made great recommendations.  Everything was delicious, and the wait time was reasonable.  They could manage dietary restrictions as well.

The only disappointment was that some of the "weekend" menu items were not available on Fridays, and the Oreo cookie cheesecake was not available that night either. üò•.

Update:  The experience will vary based on the server.  Went back again, this time they helped themselves to a tip (auto added to the bill for just three of us), and I felt attitude from the server like our requests were aggravating her.   No follow up no offer to refill drinks or see if we needed anything. This was so unlike last time.

The food remains good. Very flavorful.  Just know that if you get good service, consider yourself lucky.

Prices were reasonable, not cheap but not too pricey either.  We will definitely be back. üëç
